description:
For Makoto Hanaoka, life’s about to get more complicated. Saki Aoi, a lively girl with loads of confidence, confesses her love for Makoto one day. When he fails to reciprocate, Saki declares she will be his first love! She shares her goal with a mutual friend, Ryuuji Taiga, who also confesses his crush on Makoto. Stuck in a love triangle, Makoto must find a way to make it work and have fun.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: this is him (can’t be anyone else)
รุ่นพี่สุดสวยคนนี้เป็นผู้ชาย

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

tags.name: Bisexual
tags.description: Features a character who is romantically or sexually attracted to people of more than one sex or gender.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Boys' Love
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two males, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Aromantic
tags.description: Features a character who experiences little to no romantic attraction.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

title.native: 先輩はおとこのこ あめのち晴れ

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

__[Website](https://www.whaledontsleep.tokyo) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/WhaleDontSleep) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/whaledontsleep) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2r-wVWZXY-ClUPanhPe8_w) | [FANBOX](https://whale0302.fanbox.cc/)__

__Introduction:__
Kujira, also known as Whale Don't Sleep, is a Japanese singer, lyricist, composer, arranger and Vocaloid Producer.

__Biography:__
He started his activities on April 1, 2019.
Kujira writes lyrics, composes, and arranges all of his own music, and has been actively releasing works using VOCALOID, vocal feat. works by [yama](https://anilist.co/staff/203751/yama), [Ado](https://anilist.co/staff/244242/Ado), and others, as well as providing music to the world.
In July 2019, he released a VOCALOID album titled "Nemuru Machi".
In October 2020, he released an album of mainly features and VOCALOIDs titled "Nerenai Yoru ni Curtain o Akete".
In August 2022, he release his first album sung by himself, called "Seikatsu o Aiseru you ni Naru Made".

__[Website](https://www.whaledontsleep.tokyo) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/WhaleDontSleep) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/whaledontsleep) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2r-wVWZXY-ClUPanhPe8_w) | [FANBOX](https://whale0302.fanbox.cc/)__

__Introduction:__
Kujira, also known as Whale Don't Sleep, is a Japanese singer, lyricist, composer, arranger and Vocaloid Producer.

__Biography:__
He started his activities on April 1, 2019.
Kujira writes lyrics, composes, and arranges all of his own music, and has been actively releasing works using VOCALOID, vocal feat. works by [yama](https://anilist.co/staff/203751/yama), [Ado](https://anilist.co/staff/244242/Ado), and others, as well as providing music to the world.
In July 2019, he released a VOCALOID album titled "Nemuru Machi".
In October 2020, he released an album of mainly features and VOCALOIDs titled "Nerenai Yoru ni Curtain o Akete".
In August 2022, he release his first album sung by himself, called "Seikatsu o Aiseru you ni Naru Made".
_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/133009/)._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/studio_pablo)

Founder and representative director of Studio Pablo.
__Haruki Moriya__ is a Japanese animator, who does animation direction.
